Package edu.msoe.swe2721.lab7

Class WordChanger

java.lang.Object
edu.msoe.swe2721.lab7.WordChanger
public class WordChanger extends Object
This class will map words to their given synonyms. The words will be mapped using a hashmap.

  • Constructor Details

    • WordChanger

      public WordChanger()
      This is the default constructor which will create a new Hasmap that can be used for testing.

    • WordChanger

      public WordChanger(Map<String,String> synonymnList) throws WCException
      This is a constructor which will instantiate a new instance and cause the given synonymn list to be used.
      Parameters:
      synonymnList - This is the map of synonyms to be used.
      Throws:
      WCException - An exception will be thrown if the parameter is null.

  • Method Details

    • addSynonymPair

      public boolean addSynonymPair(String word, String synonym) throws WCException
      This method will add a new synonym pair into the listing of synonym's. The pair must be unique.
      Parameters:
      word - This is the word that is to map to a given synonym.
      synonym - This is a different word that has the same meaning as the word.
      Returns:
      This method will return true if the word can be added as a pair and false otherwise.
      Throws:
      WCException - An exception will be thrown if the word contains any whitespace or is not at least two characters in length. An exception also will be thrown if the synonym length is not at least 2 characters or has whitespace.

    • findSynonym

      public String findSynonym(String word) throws WCException
      This method will find a synonym for the given word.
      Parameters:
      word - This is the word that is to be used to locate a synonym.
      Returns:
      A synonym for the word will be returned. If there is no synonym, then null will be returned.
      Throws:
      WCException - An exception will be thrown if the length of the word is less than two characters, the word to be searched is not a singular word, or a non-alphabetic character is found in the word.

    • toLowerCase

      protected String toLowerCase(String word)
      This method will convert a string to lower case.
      Parameters:
      word - This is the word that is to be converted to lower case.
      Returns:
      A string will be returned in lower case representing the word. If word is null, null will be returned.

    • determineIfStringisSpaceFree

      protected boolean determineIfStringisSpaceFree(String text)
      This method will determine if a string lacks any whitespace within it.
      Parameters:
      text - This is the text that is to be checked for whitespace.
      Returns:
      If there is no whitespace in the string, the return will be true. Otherwise, it will be false. If the string is null it also will be false.
